get.summary: New - Searches in apple app store for the applications with the specified search string and returns the details
get.description: Searches in the App store for applications that match a specified search string (Example: Boxer) and return the details

parameters.name: appname
parameters.description: Application name to be searched. Example: Boxer. (Required)

parameters.name: countrycode
parameters.description: Country Code for searching the application in. Example: us. (Required)

get.summary: New - Searches in google playstore for the applications with the specified search string and returns the details
get.description: Searches in the Play store for applications that match a specified search string (Example: Boxer) and return the details

parameters.name: appname
parameters.description: Application name to be searched. Example: Boxer. (Required)

parameters.name: countrycode
parameters.description: Country Code for searching the application in. Example: us. (Required)

get.summary: New - Searches in Windows store for the applications with the specified search string and platform and returns the details
get.description: Searches in the Windows store for applications that match a specified search string (Example: Boxer) and return the details

parameters.name: appname
parameters.description: Application name to be searched. Example: Boxer

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The Device Platform to search the Applications for. Example: WindowsMobile. (Required)

parameters.name: countrycode
parameters.description: Country Code for searching the application in. Example: us. (Required)

get.summary: New - Gets a blob by the Guid
get.description:
Returns the contents of a blob as a byte array
This operation also accepts an optional header parameter named 'range' to request a partial download (i.e. "Range: bytes=0-1023" to download the first KB of the file). This header is ignored if the requested file does not support partial download. In order to determine whether a file supports partial download or not, call this resource with HEAD and verify if "Accept-Ranges: bytes" header presents. If header presents then you can request range download for the file.

parameters.name: blobId
parameters.description: Identifier of the blob to be retrieved(Required)

403.description: 1.{11: User is not authorized to download the requested blob.}

delete.summary: New - Deletes a blob by Guid

parameters.name: blobId
parameters.description: Identifier of the blob to be deleted(Required)

403.description: 1.{11: User is not authorized to delete the requested blob.}

head.summary: New - Gets a blob contents information by the Guid
head.description: Returns the information for blob contents

parameters.name: blobId
parameters.description: Identifier of the blob to be retrieved(Required)

Accept-Ranges.description: If present it means that the file supports partial download and it can be requested using byte range header on GET API.

403.description: 1.{11: User is not authorized to get contents information for the requested blob.}

get.summary: New - Gets the details of a public app identified by id.
get.description:
1. Retrieve the application metadata and smart group assigned to the application
2. Excluded Assignment Groups are only available for viewing in the GET call. 
   Option to edit them is not currently available through POST/PUT APIs.
3. DELETE API however deletes any SG ID associated with an application, assigned or excluded.

401.description: Unauthorized 1.{7000- Application not found or user does not have access to it.}

404.description: Not Found 1.{7000- Application not found or user does not have access to it.}

501.description: Not Implemented 1.{7020- This application has different deployment policies configured for different assignment groups. This version of the API does not support this configuration. Please use AirWatch Console for this action.}

post.description: Adds the public application selected by searching for the bundle ID (Android) or external ID (iOS) in the app market.

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The application entity to be inserted.

422.description: 1. {7000: External Id or ApplicationUrl is required for Ios apps}2. {7002: Enter either External Id or ApplicationUrl for Ios apps}3. {7000: Bundle Id or ApplicationUrl is required for {0} apps}4. {7002: Enter either Bundle Id or ApplicationUrl for {0} apps}5. {1012: Application Name is Required for Windows Phone and Desktop}6. {1012: App Tunneling must be true to associate the application with a Vpn Profile}7. {1012: Vpn Profile Id is required when AppTunneling is enabled}8. {1012: UsesSdk must be true to associate the application with a Sdk Settings Profile}9. {1012: Sdk Settings Profile Id is required when UsesSdk is enabled}10. {1012: Send App Config must be true to pass app config values to the application}11. {1012: App Config Values are required when Send Application Configuration is enabled}12. {7000: Application not found or user does not have access to it.}

put.summary: New - Updates the public application selected by searching for the bundle ID (Android) or external ID (iOS) in the app market.
put.description: Updates the details and attributes of a Public Application given the new values for a given app identifier. The app identifier is used to search for the app in the corresponding store.

400.description: Bad Request 1. {7000: Vpn Profile ID is required when AppTunneling is enabled}, 2. {7000: Sdk Settings Profile ID is required when UsesSdk is enabled}, 3. {7000: App Config Values are required when Send Application Configuration is enabled}

401.description: Unauthorized 1. {7000: Application not found or user does not have access to it.}

post.summary: Adds the public boxer flex assignment.

get.summary: Gets the public application boxer flex assignment.
get.description: Gets Flex deployment parameters for a provided application identifier. The assignments are for flex smartgroup assignments for a boxer public app.

401.description: Unauthorized 1.{7000: Application not found or user does not have access to it.}

404.description: Not Found 1.{7000: Application not found or user does not have access to it.}

post.summary: New - Assigns a Smart Group to an Public Application.
post.description:
1. Assigns the Smart Group to the app
2. Excluded Assignment Groups are only available for viewing in the GET call. 
   Option to edit them is not currently available through POST/PUT APIs.
3. DELETE API however deletes any SG ID associated with an application, assigned or excluded.

400.description: 1.{400: SmartGroup with Id : {0} is already assigned to the Application id : {1}2.{400: SmartGroup with Id : {0} is already added as an Excluded Smart Group to the Application id : {1}}

post.summary: New - Assigns Smart Groups to an BSP Application.
post.description: Assigns smartgroup identified by the smartgroup id to the BSP application

400.description: 1. {7002: Parameter Type cannot be null or empty}2. {7002: Invalid parameter type {type}}

403.description: 1. {7401: SmartGroup with Id {smartgroupid} not found or user does not have access to it.}2. {7402: Public Application with Id : {applicationid} does not exist or cannot be assigned to the listed smartgroups.}

CurrentVersion.description: Current version of App in AppStore

LargeIcon.description: Large Icon Url of the application

MediumIcon.description: Medium Icon Url of the application

SmallIcon.description: Small Icon Url of the application

AppStoreUrl.description: App Store Url of the application

ScreenshotImages.description: List of urls for screenshot images

PartialContentRange.description: Gets or sets partial content range

FileName.description: Gets or sets FileName {Will be set in the content-disposition header}

AcceptsByteRanges.description: Gets or sets a value which indicates whether a range byte request for a stream is accepted or not

SendETagHeaderValue.description: Gets or sets the option to include ETagHeaderValue

IRequestQuery.description:
Interface for IAwRequestQuery
This will hold all the required data for a request. Will be filled from ModelBinder

QueryParams.description: Gets or sets Query Parameters. For e.g. any query string parameters will be extracted to key,value pair and stored here.

TenantContext.description: Gets or sets IAwTenantContext. Will hold the tenant details, which will be filled as part of the tenant validation handler

RequestMethod.description: Gets or sets RequestMethod. Will be used to write custom rules

AllowedUriQueryChars.description: Gets or sets allowed Characters in Query String.

ITenantContext.description: Contract for TenantContext. Will be exposed from RequestQuery and will be injected to every controller actions and Business method

TenantCode.description: Gets or sets TenantCode. Uniquely identify the tenant for the request

OrganizationgroupId.description: Gets or sets Organization Group ID

Data.description: Gets or Sets the Image Data.

ResultType.description: Gets or Sets the of Image Data.

MimeType.description: Gets or Sets the Mime Type.

Name.description: Gets or sets the model name.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

ApplicationName.description: The Name of the Public Application

LargeIconUrl.description: The Url for the large icon for the Public Application

MediumIconUrl.description: The Url for the medium icon for the Public Application

SmallIconUrl.description: The Url for the small icon for the Public Application

IconId.description: The Icon Blob Id of the Public Application

ApplicationUrl.description: The Corresponding Store Url of the Public Application

ApplicationSource.description: The Source of the Public Application

Platform.description: The Platform of the Public Application

SupportedModels.description: The Models which Support the Public Application

AppSizeInKB.description: The size in kilobytes of the Public Application.

Rating.description: The Rating of the Public Application

Version.description: The Version of the Public Application

CategoryList.description: The Categories to which the Public Application belongs

AppId.description: The Bundle Id of the Public Application

Screenshots.description: The information related to Screenshots of the Public Application

MinimumOsVersion.description: The Minimum OS Version supported by the Application

DefaultScheme.description: The Default Scheme of the App

SmartGroupIds.description: The Identifiers of the Smart Groups currently assigned to the application

ExcludedSmartGroupIds.description: The Identifiers of the Smart Groups currently excluded from receiving the application

PushMode.description: The PushMode (Auto / OnDemand ) of the App

IsAppRestrictedToSilentInstall.description: Indicates whether is app restricted to silent install or not

RequireManagement.description: Indicates whether device should be enrolled to get the app or not

UsesSdk.description: Indicates whether application uses AirWatch SDK

SendAppConfig.description: Indicates whether App Configuration values should be sent along with the application.

RemoveOnUnEnroll.description: Indicates whether the application should be removed on unenrollment.

PreventApplicationBackup.description:
Indicates whether application back up will be prevented on the device.
Currently supported for iOS5.

AllowManagement.description: Indicates whether the admin chooses to assume management of User Installed Apps.

VpnProfileId.description: The VPN Profile ID associated with the application if AppTunneling is enabled

VpnProfile.description: The name of the VPN Profile associated with the application if Apptunneling is enabled

SdkSettingsProfileId.description: The ID for the SDK settings profile associated with the app if UsesSDK is enabled

SdkSettingsProfile.description: The name of the SDK settings associated with the application if UsesSDK is enabled

AppSettingProfileId.description: The ID of the App Settings Profile applicable to the devices in this assignment if UsesSDK is enabled

AppSettingsProfile.description: The name of the App settings associated with the application if UsesSDK is enabled

AppConfigs.description: The Application Configuration Key-Value Pairs to be sent to the device when SendAppConfig is enabled
